metadata.description: Relationship 'search_people' and all reports and report views.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `last_person_position+end_date` IS NOT NULL AND `last_person_position+end_date` != '1970-01-01 00:00:00' THEN 'employee_status|old_employee' WHEN `application+position` IS NOT NULL AND `application+position` != '' THEN 'employee_status|applicant' WHEN `last_person_position+start_date` IS NOT NULL THEN 'employee_status|employee' ELSE 'employee_status|old_applicant' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current status of this employee

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The last position this person has held.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The position details for the last position held by this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The last facility where this person worked.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The last job held by this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The application details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: This shows the status on a person's record whether complete or incomplete

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The next of kin details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The personal contacts for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The demographic information of the person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Search relationship for all person records.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Search all person records in the system.
